design_philosophy.core_vibe: Military Intelligence meets Cyberpunk Pragmatism. High contrast, data-dense, zero fluff.
design_philosophy.visual_style: Dark Mode Only. Matte blacks, electric accents, razor-sharp edges.

layout_strategy.global: Fluid width, max-w-[1920px] mx-auto. 100vh height for dashboard (no scroll on body if possible, scroll in panels).
layout_strategy.grid_system: Bento Grid Mode B (High Density). 12-column grid.
layout_strategy.spacing: Compact. p-4 is standard. Gap-4 between widgets.

buttons.style: Sharp or slightly rounded (rounded-sm). Uppercase text. Hover: Glow effect.

cards.style: bg-card border border-white/5 rounded-md shadow-none. Hover: border-white/10.
cards.header: Border-b border-white/5 p-4 flex justify-between items-center

inputs.style: bg-black/50 border-white/10 focus:border-blue-500/50 focus:ring-1 focus:ring-blue-500/20 rounded-sm

charts.theme: Dark mode optimized. Grid lines: stroke='#333'. Tooltips: bg-black border-white/10.

visual_enhancers.glassmorphism: Use sparingly. Only for floating panels (Chat citations). backdrop-blur-md bg-black/80 border border-white/10.
visual_enhancers.scanlines: Optional: Overlay a pointer-events-none div with repeating linear gradient for a 'monitor' feel on the dashboard.
visual_enhancers.glows: Use box-shadow for 'active' states, not gradients.
visual_enhancers.loading: ASCII spinners or 'System Initializing...' text sequences.

image_urls.logo_placeholder: Use text 'OBSIDIAN' in Barlow Condensed font.

universal_guidelines: NEVER use rounded-xl or rounded-2xl. Maximum rounded-md.
Avoid purple/pink unless it's a specific 'Threat' indicator.
Animations must be fast (150ms-200ms). No slow drifts.
Scrollbars: Custom thin style, dark gray thumb, black track.
instructions_to_main_agent: Implement the design system by updating tailwind.config.js first. Create a 'layout.js' that enforces the sidebar + main content structure. Use the specified fonts. For the 'Ask' page, build a split-pane layout (Chat Left, Context Right). For the Dashboard, use the Bento Grid strategy.
